title: Open: A Tale of Love, Mermaids, Bassists, & Creepy Dudes
description: Amy Evans. Bisexual. Millenial. Montrealer. Amy and David are in an open relationship and it’s going great. She navigates the ups – dating gorgeous people – and downs – trying to avoid creeps – of the dating scene, when she meets a hot bassist and falls in love.This was not part of the plan.Amy must figure out how to deal with these unexpected feelings without neglecting her primary relationship, even as she keeps meeting new potential hook-ups. Surrounded by her quirky group of queer friends and the support of her boyfriend, she might find there’s a simple answer: polyamory.Well, not so simple. But y’know.Spice Level: Light open door. There are several smut scenes but we fade to black halfway through. Equivalent to M on Ao3.
author: Emilie Nantel
